nodes.text: The MRK-3 Assassin Prototype droid was a more recent model of Assassin droid created by the Chromium Kings and presumably owned by Khundu. They resembled a Mataou Hutt security droid. The only known Prototype was destroyed by The Smuggler, who was sent by the Ivax Syndicate to stop the Chromium Kings from bragging about a recent sale of "specialized" droids.
